name: Rundone Heroes
description:
Rundone Heroes is a roguelite platformer for android. Your job is to survive as long as possible using variety of weapons and items. You have 40 items and around 20 weapons at your disposal.

This is a demo version of the game. It contains first  level that ends with a boss fight. We would like to know what is your opinion about the game. Which features do you like and which ones would you like to be changed.

Devblog link

You can support us on Patreon.

Demo content:

- 3 playable characters

  

- one, three staged level ending with a boss fight

- 40 unique items to collect

       

- 15 different weapons
